body_html:
Hi, I've just quickly glanced over the thread but can't find a reference to the file that actually causes the issue or I would have tried to reproduce it myself. If you've got a valid bzip2 file that Compress fails to read and can share it then please open an issue with Apache Commons Compress in JIRA.

You may want to check whether things would work with Compress 1.16.1 first, there have been some changes to the stream class in question but I don't recall anybody reporting a "block overrun" before.

body:
Hi, I've just quickly glanced over the thread but can't find a reference to the file that actually causes the issue or I would have tried to reproduce it myself. If you've got a valid bzip2 file that Compress fails to read and can share it then please open an issue with Apache Commons Compress [in JIRA](https://issues.apache.org/jira/projects/COMPRESS).

You may want to check whether things would work with Compress 1.16.1 first, there have been some changes to the stream class in question but I don't recall anybody reporting a "block overrun" before.
